entry.title: About
entry.summary:
First release in '89, infinitely beta thereafter

It has been an interesting journey for the past 23 years,

A great man once said

"Laziness, Impatience and Hubris, the three great virtues of a programmer" Larry Wall-The Author of Perl Programming Language

Since I have all these qualities in great proportions, I'm expected to be a great programmer, no? So if you see this blog with a lot of ga

If you want to take the leap of faith, and follow my alter-egos in the parallel universes of twitterati and blogosphere.
